sidebar.helpCenterBody: Having trouble? Please contact us for more questions.

landing.mainTitle: AICE AI | Make Strategy Clear, Make Plans Succeed.
landing.subTitle: Your Professional Advisor for Corporate Strategy and Grant Proposals.
landing.feature1Desc: Analyze the current situation to find the right direction for the enterprise.
landing.feature2Desc: Directly generate content that is time-saving, precise, and usable.
landing.feature3Desc: Find the right resources for you, instead of applying blindly.
landing.footer: When the direction is clear, the enterprise moves forward. AICE leads the way.

stageManagement.welcomeTitle: Welcome to AICE AI Super Advisor
stageManagement.emptyStateBody: Click the button to create a new project.
stageManagement.searchEmptyBody: Please try adjusting your search keywords.
stageManagement.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.
stageManagement.searchPlaceholder: Search projects by title or tag...

projectWorkspace.noProjectSelectedBody: Please return to the 'Project Management' page to select or create a new project.

radarChart.minCriteria: Please select at least 3 scoring criteria to display the radar chart.

stage0.title: Latest Government Grant Information
stage0.subtitle: Activate the AI search engine to automatically sync the latest grant information from major government websites in Taiwan.
stage0.noMatch: No grants found matching the filter criteria.
stage0.noResults: No relevant grant information found, or the AI service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

stage1.subtitle: This is the starting point for all projects. Use this one page to clearly define the core value of your plan.
stage1.whyPlaceholder: Which policy does it correspond to? What market pain point does it solve?
stage1.whatPlaceholder: What is the specific technology, product, or service to be developed?
stage1.whoNeedsItPlaceholder: Who are the target customers? How urgent is their need?
stage1.whatToVerifyPlaceholder: What are the key success indicators? (e.g., Technology TRL, product performance)
stage1.benefitsPlaceholder: What are the expected quantitative benefits? (e.g., increase efficiency by %, reduce cost by %)
stage1.grantMatchingBody: Select grants you are interested in from the 'Latest Grants' or let AI automatically match the best options for you.
stage1.noGrantsToMatch: No available grant list. Please go to the 'Latest Grants' page to fetch data first.
stage1.compareGrantWhy: This project draft aims to correspond to the '{{title}}' grant issued by '{{department}}'.
stage1.compareGrantTodo: [To be filled: Please specify based on grant requirements]
stage1.quickStartModalBody: Please provide the basic direction of the project, and AI will generate a complete 'Concept Summary Card' draft for you.
stage1.networkModalBody: Enter the 'Industry' or 'Technology Theme' you want to analyze, and AI will generate a report including policy maps, resource distribution, and strategic recommendations.

stageSettings.title: User Management
stageSettings.subtitle: Add, edit, or remove user accounts.
stageSettings.passwordSecurityNote: Note: In a production environment, passwords should be handled by a secure backend with proper hashing.
stageSettings.deleteConfirmBody: Are you sure you want to delete user '{{name}}'? This action cannot be undone.
stageSettings.deleteSelfError: You cannot delete your own account.

errors.tagsRateLimitOnCreate: Project created, but tags could not be generated due to AI service quota limits.
errors.tagsGenericOnCreate: Project created, but an unknown error occurred while generating AI tags.
errors.fetchGrantsRateLimit: AI service quota has been reached. Please try again later or check your plan.
errors.fetchGrantsGeneric: Could not fetch grant information. Please try again later.
